mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address_search_cache (city_name, keyword, results, source, hit_count, last_hit_time, expire_time) VALUES (#{cityName}, #{keyword}, #{results}, #{source}, #{hitCount}, #{lastHitTime}, #{expireTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE address_search_cache SET hit_count = #{hitCount}, last_hit_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM address_search_cache WHERE expire_time IS NOT NULL AND expire_time <= NOW()
